title: Record Renault earnings strengthen Ghosn's hand
text:
Record Renault earnings strengthen Ghosn's hand 2:56pm GMT - 01:47 
French carmaker Renault posts record sales and profits for 2017, bolstering Chief Executive Carlos Ghosn's position in the face of government demands for a clearer succession plan and deeper integration with alliance partner Nissan. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
French carmaker Renault posts record sales and profits for 2017, bolstering Chief Executive Carlos Ghosn's position in the face of government demands for a clearer succession plan and deeper integration with alliance partner Nissan.
